00013 Displacement :: Displacement(const double* _h) {
00014   //printf("Constructor Displacement( double*)\n\n");
00015   h = new double[ndims];
00016   for (int k1 = 0; k1 < ndims; k1++) {
00017     h[k1] = _h[k1];
00018   }
00019 };
00020 
00021 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00022 
00023 Displacement :: ~Displacement() {
00024   //printf("Destructor Displacement\n\n");
00025   if (h != NULL) delete[] h;
00026 };
00027 
00028 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00029 
00030 const double* Displacement::getVoxelSize() const {
00031   return h;
00032 };

00150 void flirt::swapDisplacements(Displacement &U1, Displacement &U2) {
00151   double* tmp = U1.data;
00152   U1.data = U2.data;
00153   U2.data = tmp;
